section.p: As you get closer to the person walking ahead, you see it is a woman wrapped in a thin ragged tunic and carrying a sack. She must be very poor; her straw sandals are worn through and her feet are raw with blisters. Perhaps that is why she is sobbing quietly to herself.
Drawing level, you ask if she is all right but she turns away and buries her face in her sleeve. Her weeping is quite piteous. It is obvious she is very upset.
